title: US judge blocks Trump from removing Lisa Cook as Federal Reserve governor
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Jia Cobb's ruling does not settle the key issue of whether the Trump administration's claims that Cook committed mortgage fraud.

title: Democrat wins special election to fill Rep. Gerald Connolly's seat
shortDescription: Democrat James Walkinshaw won the Sept. 9 Virginia special election to fill late Rep. Gerald Connolly’s seat.

title: I'll have seafood, hold the crime: Trump dines in DC, says streets now safe
shortDescription: Trump visited a DC restaurant he didn't own for the first time as president to show the city was safer with his police takeover and National Guard.

title: Trump to crack down on pharma ads
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced plans to increase enforcement on pharmaceutical ads and closing loopholes on side effect disclosures.

title: Trump announces Princeton student released by Iran-backed militia
shortDescription: Elizabeth Tsurkov, a Princeton graduate student held hostage in Iraq, has been freed by the Iranian militia Kataib Hezbollah, President Trump said.

title: Trump to go after pharma companies and social media influencer ads
shortDescription: Trump will also take regulatory action to close loophole which allows pharmaceutical companies to omit a comprehensive list of every side effect.

title: White House welcomes handwriting analysis of Trump card to Epstein
shortDescription: A former FBI forensic handwriting analyst tells USA TODAY an expert should be able to tell whether the lewd letter is a forgery, or written by Trump.

title: Trump administration's $4.7M contract for El Salvador prison revealed
shortDescription: The $4.67 million agreement appeared in a federal court disclosure as part of a civil suit from a group of human rights organizations.

title: See the White House host sports through the years
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will be hosting the White House’s first UFC fight next summer. Look back at past sports events held at the White House.

title: WH denies Trump signature on Epstein letter
shortDescription: The White House said President Donald Trump never signed Jeffrey Epstein’s birthday letter and vowed legal action against the Wall Street Journal.

title: Missouri House approves Republican-drawn congressional map
shortDescription: The "Missouri First" map, which passed solely with Republican votes, breaks up a Democratic-held district in Kansas City.

title: Supreme Court OKs block for now on congressionally approved US aid
shortDescription: After he took office, President Trump paused all foreign aid and said any assistance that didn’t align with his priorities would be terminated.

title: Supreme Court to decide fate of Trump's sweeping tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump is relying on the tariffs to raise revenue, spur manufacturing and exert political pressure on other countries.

title: What is it like in Chicago? Trump Connect reporter takes you on a tour
shortDescription: President Donald Trump continuously toys with sending troops into Chicago to address crime. Follow our reporter in the city for an afternoon.

title: Who is Ken Griffin? Billionaire warns against Trump’s Fed attacks
shortDescription: Billionaire and Republican megadonor Ken Griffin, CEO of Citadel, wrote an op-ed in the Wall Street Journal warning against Trump's Fed attacks.

title: Israel's attack in Qatar was 'very unfortunate,' White House says
shortDescription: The White House issued a sharp rebuke of Israel's unprecedented airstrike in Qatar targeting Hamas leaders, criticizing the location of the attack.

title: Trump applauds West Point for canceling Tom Hanks award
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump has praised West Point for cancelling plans to honor Tom Hanks with a prestigious award, calling the actor a “destructive, woke” figure.

title: Trump calls Epstein birthday note a 'dead issue' after release of book
shortDescription: President Donald Trump declined to discuss a House committee's release of a note and lewd drawing purported to be from Trump to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Epstein’s birthday letter released. Trump denies signing it
shortDescription: A letter purportedly from Donald Trump to Jeffrey Epstein was released. Trump denies the signature is his. What does enigma mean? What to know.
